```{r global-options, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(reactable)
library(readxl)
library(crosstalk)
library(targets)
library(codemapper)
library(flextable)

all_lkps_maps <- tar_read(all_lkps_maps_raw) %>% 
  purrr::map(codemapper:::rm_footer_rows_all_lkps_maps_df) %>%
  purrr::map(~ tibble::rowid_to_column(.data = .x,
                                       var = ".rowid"))

read_v2_read_ctv3 <- all_lkps_maps$read_v2_read_ctv3
read_v2_lkp <- all_lkps_maps$read_v2_lkp
read_ctv3_lkp <- all_lkps_maps$read_ctv3_lkp
```
